body: Can you try to convert the line numbers to what they'd be on a fixed commit, e.g. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/65837375d98b3e9949d15dc05e66e6356eada283/src/net.cpp#L1885 is not a line that takes a lock so other people can't do anything with this error as-is.

The linenumbers match on the head of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7685.
Here are the direct links to the source code:
```
2016-08-26 07:50:29 POTENTIAL DEADLOCK DETECTED
2016-08-26 07:50:29 Previous lock order was:
2016-08-26 07:50:29  pnode->cs_vRecvMsg  net.cpp:1885 (TRY)
```
